9.SummaryEnglish: Continuing the bakeoff competition, Sakuro learns a new technique from a fellow chef, Mr. Yamashita. Using one of the techniques, Sakuro brings in the victory to his own pride.

10.SummaryEnglish: Maeko pitches a new television series on TyataTV. However, everything seems to fail when he discovers that someone is trying to rob him.

11.TitleEnglish: Start a Search for a Long Lost Relative
11.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu received news about the evidence of his missing brother, Hishio, from a citizen. While finding more evidence, he decided to go around the world to search for him, starting with the Daro region.

12.SummaryEnglish: The crew have met again with Daishi, only to understand that she is robbed from her foster home. Daishi reveals a terrible secret about her past.

13.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers went to the Daro library, while Kouchu browse around for clues of Hishio in order to fight them. At the library, they learned more about Devil J and uncovered his forbidden secrets.

14.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and the crew went over to the airport after they traveled around the Oregon region in search for his brother, Hishio. However, when they were first in the Daro region, another rumor have stated that Hishio is in the Oregon region. As they landed on Oregon, Dan have ran into Kouchu again to tell him the bad news. Meanwhile, Maeko and Topazu visited the Oregon TyataTV's studios, the place where Maeko broadcast his show. Things have changed since Maeko have retired. The Galaxy Five is back in business by the Furious Five to cause chaos of the Crystal Brawlers.

15.SummaryEnglish: The Galaxy Five have the Z Balls in their hands ready to turn in for Hunter Grain, only their plan to be stopped by Kouchu and Dan, but once again, the Galaxy Five is strong enough to get through with the Crystal Brawlers until Tencoat is finally at his limit...

16.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers have ran into a familliar friend named Parcc. However, while he is held captive by the capturers of the legendary Crystal Monsters, Kouchu and his friends must stop him. However, dark forces are up to them when the Moon Five have used their ultimate attack on their Crystal Monsters.

17.SummaryEnglish: In order to free Parcc from the mysterious trap, the Crystal Monsters have looked for the Galaxy Emerald, an emerald that could break into anything. However, the Galaxy Five Crystal Monsters are prepared to attack the Crystal Monsters until Kouchu and Roaracryst are able to break through the galactic barriers.

18.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers have finally reached the Dandfordon region, where Akungigi was reunited with his parents. However, after their reunion, the ground have been shaking, causing everyone in the Dandfordon region to panic. The Moon Five, the new members, have faced the Crystal Brawlers in the fight for the Crystal Balls back.

19.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Monsters have continued their fight with the Moon Five, but all of them are unable to continue to fight with the Moon Five, making Roaracryst able to transform once he could run his energy on his levels. However, it won't be enough to put the new Moon Five members on the ground.

20.SummaryEnglish: The new transformation have made Roaracryst snap, and he was able to defeat the new Moon Five members, where his powers are bizzare from another universe. The brawlers met up with Professor Shari to show where Roaracryst's bizzare powers came from. The brawlers went to discover that dimension where there are Crystals everywhere.

21.SummaryEnglish: After the battle, the storm have begun to approach the Crystal World again, where it is a sign of an unknown force. The storm have begun to destroy homes and villages, and the only Crystal Monster revealed to communicate with it was the Crystal Monster, Marc. Kouchu went to search for him.

22.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and Roaracryst have already found Marc unconsious during the storm, in which makes him weak. Marc have refused Kouchu's offer after he have communicated with the ongoing storm, However, what he was about to do was to make the storm worst, in which Kouchu have to convince Marc to give up the fight.

23.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers have decided to explore more about the storm, as Shari have led them to the time machine, where the storm was originated in the Natalie Region. However, it has appeared that when they have returned to the present time of the timeline, the storm have occurred once again.

24.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and his friends are already back in the Natalie Region, as things over there have started to get worst again. They have met again with Fugifugi, Nachiro, and Ashungina. The storm have continued to approach until the Crystal Monsters are able to communicate with it with their communication powers.

25.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu tries to get through the storm in order to gather the Crystal Balls that surrounds them. However, once the task is too difficult to get through, Kouchu got caught in a situation where he was trapped in the tornado that sends him into a magical land, in which he is looking for the balls.

26.SummaryEnglish: As Kouchu was trying to escape the land to protect the Crystal Balls himself, the rest of the crew are looking for him, However, once he was surrounded by thieves, Rottobigin's soul have suddenly returned to save Kouchu. Afterwards, Rottobigin have ended up telling Kouchu the story about the tragedy of his own legacy.

27.SummaryEnglish: It's Hirodana's Birthday! As the Crystal Brawlers have gathered around for Emma's 18th birthday, as she have begun to feel older. However, the only thing to ruin her 18th birthday party was to discover about Garnet's secret marriage to the Crystal Queen, which she bribes him to hold the mysterious Crystal ball for her.

28.SummaryEnglish: Ditching Hirodana's birthday party, Garnet and the queen, Izare, have already prepared for their honeymoon, with Garnet already unaware that she is only using him for the Crystal Balls. Hirodana have stepped in and asked Garnet to get back to her. However, Garnet began ignoring Hirodana so he could be with Izare, leaving her heartbroken.

29.SummaryEnglish: After learning about Izare's hidden secret, Garnet already knew that he was being used by her for getting the Crystal Balls. In only way to divorce was to destroy the ring in his hand, which would disconnect from hers. However, she began chasing after him, while Garnet is running looking for Emma.

30.SummaryEnglish: After the Crystal Brawlers have reached the Orbon region, after celebrating Hirodana's Birthday, they were sent to the forest where Garnet have married Izabe. However, once they have got in the forest, they can't get out. The Crystal Brawlers must find a way to escape the forest, which the animals in the forest are controlled by Izabe, who wants revenge.

31.SummaryEnglish: The Brawlers are trapped by Izabe, where she have begun to take revenge against Garnet for rejecting her marriage to him. However, Garnet have ended up defeating Izabe after she have attempted to kill Hirodana with the Crystal Monsters. Garnet is worried about his relationship with Hirodana, so he asked her to marry him.

32.SummaryEnglish: In this top filler episode, chibis Kouchu and Roaracryst shows clips from the last 28 years of the airing of Crystal Jewels, read fan emails on the website, and show off their top favorite moments from the anime series.

33.SummaryEnglish: After she was surprised that Garnet have proposed to her, Hirodana have some thoughts, stating that she isn't ready for the married life yet. Instead of hurting his feelings, Hirodana have told Garnet that they both should wait until she is ready to get married, which have turned Garnet down, wondering what could happen between them in the future. At the end of the episode, Garnet wonders what will happen in the future?

35.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and Roakijushiku have accidentally trapped themselves into the fully Crystalized island. There, they have met Crystallas, Iccryst's previous assistant from Marc. Meanwhile, Bukirashi and Shun have convinced Akungigi to take some drugs discovered in the forbidden island, but he and the other boys got arrested, which distracts the girls' night out for Shanji and her friends, to bail them out.

36.TitleEnglish: Go Back Where You Came From! (1)
36.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and his friends have found Maeko's letter from the Romarima Region, and discovered that he was born there. When Kouchu shows the letter to Maeko, he have decided to bring Kouchu to Romarima with him so he could revisit his birth parents. Meanwhile, Shauna and Sakuro have ran into Maeko's adoptive parents, and revealed that they abandoned Maeko.

37.TitleEnglish: Go Back Where You Came From! (2)
37.SummaryEnglish: Maeko noticed that Topaz has been ignoring him lately. Which is a reason why his feelings for Kouchu have revived. When Maeko attempted to persuade Kouchu in love, there is a challenging situation in both of their relationship. Meanwhile, when they arrive back in Moona, Maeko finally comes face to face with his father and then Topaz.

38.TitleEnglish: The War Between People and Crystal Monsters
38.SummaryEnglish: Hunter Grai's relative, Hunter Knives have got back from the dead due to Devil J's rising power, stating that he must revolt the Crystal Monsters against every Crystal Brawler. However, once he arrives back, Hunter Grai and Hunter Knives have a one-on-one battle stand in which what race controls the Crystal World. Meanwhile, the Crystal Brawlers discovers a giant meteor.

39.SummaryEnglish: The Brawlers rush through Professor Shari's lab and got trapped through Shari's junk. Shari have warned the Crystal Brawlers that according to her prediction, a Crystal Monster will come over to take over the Crystal World. Unsure of what's going on, the Crystal Monsters ended up playing with her inventions until they all went up to a dimension where the world is ruled by evil.

41.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers are having a nice day out at the big mall, until the big threat is coming to the Crystal World to ruin everything. The newcomer, NIGHT and the three Moonhunters came from Hunter Grai's willpower to take over the Crystal World in it's entirety. The Crystal Brawlers prepares for the battle of their lives.

42.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers are in full battle with NIGHT, only to discover his one true power that they couldn't stand. Meanwhile, Kouchu and Roaracryst decided to find the people to evacuate, but an alliance stands in their way as they are trying to succeed in their plan. The Crystal Monsters battle the evil NIGHT brawlers.

43.TitleEnglish: The Call of Death and Life
43.SummaryEnglish: While the Crystal Monsters are continuing to fight the NIGHT Monsters, Kouchu and Roaracryst have immediately ran to Shari to break the elements of NIGHT. However, the inventions used are already broken, and Kouchu and Roaracryst have already ran out of options to stop NIGHT. The gang are at ease with the battle.

44.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Monsters are continuing to fight in the battle against NIGHT, only realizing that they are out of options. Rottobigin have finally returned for Kouchu and Roaracryst, and Kouchu's main plan to rescue everyone is to gather all of his Crystal Monsters to fight with him in the course of the biggest battle.

45.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Monsters are about to be defeated by NIGHT and the mighty Crystal Monsters. Meanwhile, Kouchu, Roaracryst, and Rottobigin have found themselves surrounded by the devil fog that are spreaded across the Moona Region. The Crystal Monsters have also struggled to keep up in the fight, but seem to be defeated.

46.SummaryEnglish: When the Crystal Monsters have been shut down, NIGHT have finally caught them into the cell, locking them up in the Crystal-Ball like sphere. Kouchu and Roaracryst are alerted about this, and they venture to rescue their friends back, but couldn't get pass NIGHT as they are ultra secured fields.

47.SummaryEnglish: NIGHT has his power locked up on any Crystal Monster that comes his way.

49.TitleEnglish: Crystal Monsters Report to the Field

50.SummaryEnglish: The Brawlers are set against NIGHT's traps and they struggle to escape.

52.SummaryEnglish: NIGHT creates the portal towards the hell path.

53.SummaryEnglish: The Seven Circles are taking everything from Moona. Can Kouchu stop it?

54.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu activates Rottobigin to help him finish the job.

55.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu was able to save the Crystal World from the circle vortex

56.SummaryEnglish: Akungigi found a special watch that lets anything be done repeatedly. However, his misuse of the watch causes problems around the region.

57.SummaryEnglish: Shun receives an arranged marriage from his parents from a woman he never met. How will this play out for him?

58.SummaryEnglish: Turns out the woman Shu was supposed to marry turns out to work for NIGHT! Shu has to do something about it or trouble will rise in Moona again!

59.SummaryEnglish: NIGHT is on a one on one stand with Kouchu and Roaracryst, and they are ready to kick him out of the world once and for all.

60.SummaryEnglish: NIGHT and Kouchu and Roaracryst's fight lead Kouchu to take a risky turn to protecting Roaracryst by throwing NIGHT into the dimension.

1.SummaryEnglish: In this episode, the Crystal Brawlers embark on a new adventure in the Victor Stadium series. As they journey forward, they encounter fresh challenges and mysteries while striving to protect the Crystal Balls from the clutches of evil forces. The stakes are higher than ever, and Kouchu and his friends must summon their courage and brawling skills to prevail.

2.TitleEnglish: Who Is The New Brawler and Traveler!?!
2.SummaryEnglish: A new character enters the fray, and the Crystal Brawlers are faced with intriguing questions. Who is this newcomer, and how will they impact the team's dynamic? As they explore uncharted territory, the group must adapt to change and confront the mysteries of their evolving world.

3.SummaryEnglish: In this episode, Kouchu's personal journey takes center stage as he searches for his long-lost brother. The quest for family and identity unfolds as Kouchu and his friends navigate through challenges and revelations that could reshape their destinies.

4.SummaryEnglish: Tensions rise as the Crystal Brawlers find themselves on the precipice of a major confrontation. The forces of good and evil draw near, and the outcome of their clash will have far-reaching consequences. The stakes have never been higher, and the group must brace themselves for an intense showdown.

5.SummaryEnglish: As the team continues their adventures in the Daro region, they stumble upon a valuable clue. This newfound information sets them on a path filled with intrigue and discovery. The mysteries of Daro deepen, and the Crystal Brawlers must decipher the secrets that lie ahead.

6.SummaryEnglish: The Mighty Mouselettes return for another thrilling adventure, and this time, they bring even more excitement and challenges to the Crystal Brawlers' journey. Together, they face formidable foes and embark on a mission that will test their mettle.

7.SummaryEnglish: Changes are afoot as the male police trio faces a pivotal moment in their journey. The bonds of friendship are put to the test, and decisions made in this episode will shape the course of their adventures.

8.TitleEnglish: Explosion in the City of Daro!
8.SummaryEnglish: Daro is rocked by an explosive event, throwing the Crystal Brawlers into chaos. They must uncover the truth behind the incident and confront the forces responsible. Danger looms large as they navigate the aftermath of the explosion.

9.TitleEnglish: Kochu and Cyhane: The Temporary Police Duo
9.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and Cyhane join forces in this episode, taking on the roles of temporary police officers. Their partnership leads to unexpected challenges and revelations as they work together to maintain peace in their world.

10.SummaryEnglish: Roaracryst faces a daunting trial in this episode as they confront extreme heat. The outcome of this challenge will determine their strength and resilience. The Crystal Brawlers must rally together to support their friend and face the fiery test ahead.

11.SummaryEnglish: In this episode, the Crystal Brawlers encounter a mysterious and unbreakable fruit with unique properties. As they investigate its origin and powers, they must also contend with new challenges and adversaries on their journey to protect the Crystal Balls.

12.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers stumble upon a secret island located near Daro. As they explore this enigmatic locale, they uncover hidden truths and face unexpected dangers. The island holds the key to unraveling the mysteries of their world.

13.SummaryEnglish: A ring of fire blazes through the landscape, presenting a formidable obstacle for the Crystal Brawlers. To overcome this fiery challenge, they must rely on their wits and teamwork. The episode is filled with intense action and high-stakes battles.

14.SummaryEnglish: Garem, a powerful and enigmatic figure from the past, returns to the Crystal World. His reappearance sends shockwaves through the Crystal Brawlers' ranks, and they must prepare to confront this formidable adversary once again.

15.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers find themselves entangled in a daring prison escape plot. With danger lurking at every turn, they must use their brawling skills and resourcefulness to navigate the treacherous path to freedom.

16.SummaryEnglish: Nicky, a beloved member of the Crystal Brawlers, achieves a remarkable feat by collecting 100 ribbons. This accomplishment sparks celebration and camaraderie among the group. However, new challenges and adventures await as they continue their journey.

17.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers participate in the first part of a thrilling Strawberry Contest. As they showcase their skills and creativity, tensions rise, and rivalries intensify. Who will emerge victorious in this delectable competition?

18.SummaryEnglish: The Strawberry Contest continues with even more excitement and culinary challenges. The Crystal Brawlers face off against skilled competitors and push their abilities to the limit. The contest becomes a test of their determination and culinary prowess.

19.SummaryEnglish: The final installment of the Strawberry Contest unfolds, culminating in a grand showdown. As the Crystal Brawlers vie for the top prize, they must draw upon their unique talents and teamwork to secure victory. The competition reaches its thrilling climax.

20.SummaryEnglish: A massive zoo arrives in the Crystal World, bringing with it a host of exotic animals and adventures. The Crystal Brawlers explore this captivating attraction, but they soon discover that it holds unexpected surprises and challenges.

21.SummaryEnglish: In this episode, the Crystal Brawlers encounter a rare and elusive species of creatures in their journey. As they strive to understand and protect these unique beings, they uncover the secrets surrounding these rare species and their significance in the Crystal World.

22.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers embark on a quest to find and protect mysterious glass animals that hold special significance in the Crystal World. Their journey takes them through perilous adventures and unexpected encounters as they seek to safeguard these fragile treasures.

1.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and his friends encounter a legendary Crystal Brawler known as the Azure Hero, who possesses incredible strength and determination.

2.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Brawlers must confront a powerful foe who wields both light and darkness, and they must learn to balance their strengths and weaknesses to overcome this formidable opponent.

3.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers encounter a mysterious figure from the past, who holds key information about the legend and the history of the Crystal World.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and his friends visited a brand new mall in Farko, only for them to discover that it is haunted at midnight when Mouselette was left inside.

5.SummaryEnglish: Wakisan works on a project to broadcast on live TV for a proposal for Shari's upgrade. However, when an very embarrassment accident occurs on the screen and accidentally uploaded, he plans on stopping the upload before it gets broadcast!

6.SummaryEnglish: Shun and his police officers celebrate Justice Day with the Crystal Brawlers. Marukas have hacked onto their cars, so Shun borrows Arthur to try to get it back.

7.SummaryEnglish: Sakuro wants to write a novel to impress the hot librarian. However, he spills a mysterious potion on the page, so the Japanese characters come to life! They break free off of the page to cause mischief around the neighborhood!

8.SummaryEnglish: Wakisan plan to use the Lucky Clover for his new song, however, it turns mysteriously black, giving him all the bad luck.

9.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and Roaracryst must team up with the Marukas to prevent the city from being covered with sand created by the evil Sand King.

10.SummaryEnglish: Roaracryst's ancestors left a note to him stating that there is a treasure hidden in the middle of the country.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Steel Five comes to the Jarbon with motorcycles and kidnaps Shari to ask her for the Crystal Balls. It's up to Kouchu and the crew to rescue her.

12.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and his friends find themselves in a risky situation setted by the Steel Five that they must surpass before rescuing Shari's life.

13.SummaryEnglish: The Marukas start a snack company, selling snacks to people to hypnotize them to do their bidding, so Roaracryst, along with the Food Patrol, cancels their company.

14.SummaryEnglish: Roaracryst develops eye bubbles after watching "acid" videos. Kouchu and his friends look for him when he floats around.
